org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.adapter

Interface AdapterIndexMappingStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdapterIndexMappingStoreImpl, JobContextAdapterIndexMappingStore

    public interface AdapterIndexMappingStore
    This is responsible for persisting adapter/index mappings (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdapterIndexMapping(AdapterToIndexMapping mapping)
      If an adapter is already associated with indices and the provided indices do not match, update the mapping to include the combined set of indices
      AdapterToIndexMapping getIndicesForAdapter(short internalAdapterId) 
      void remove(short adapterId)
      Adapter to index mappings are maintain without regard to visibility constraints.
      boolean remove(short adapterId, String indexName)
      Remove an index for the specified adapter mapping.
      void removeAll()

      • remove

        boolean remove(short adapterId,
               String indexName)
        Remove an index for the specified adapter mapping. The method should return false if the adapter, or index for the adapter does not exist.
        Parameters:
        adapterId -
        indexName -
